title: Time to prepare for South African conditions: India's urgent ODI overhaul for 2027 World Cup

While Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli remain a strong core, the lower middle-order and pace attack require significant attention and development to ensure a balanced squad for the global tournament.

title: ‘Stand up to ICE’: Mamdani’s firm message amid Trump's crackdown; video shows how to handle raids

He emphasized that agents need warrants for private spaces and warned about ICE's right to lie, urging residents to remain silent and film agents. Mamdani pledged to defend the city's immigrant population against aggressive enforcement.

title: How the Bill to Disconnect can become India's most democratised workplace reform
description: The Right to Disconnect Bill marks a decisive shift in India’s work culture by giving employees the legal right to refuse after-hours communication. If adopted, it could transform India’s hustle-driven ecosystem into a more democratic and humane world of work.

'Recipe for disaster': Why Delhi nightclubs are on knife’s edge
description: A devastating fire at a nightclub in Goa, claiming the lives of 25 people, has thrown a glaring spotlight on the inadequate fire safety measures in Delhi's entertainment spots. In spite of existing regulations, many venues suffer from overcrowded layouts, obstructed exits, and flammable decor, while maintenance seems to be a low priority.

title: 'Dhurandhar' BO collection: Ranveer Singh starrer scores Rs 100 crore India opening
description: Aditya Dhar's 'Dhurandhar', starring Ranveer Singh, has achieved a phenomenal opening week at the box office, exceeding trade expectations. The film delivered an explosive debut weekend, grossing Rs 119 crore domestically and over Rs 140 crore worldwide. This marks Ranveer Singh's career-best launch and a significant milestone for debutante Sara Arjun.

title: ‘Wanted a son’: Less than hour after giving birth, woman kills baby in Ghaziabad, arrested

description: “The American representatives know the basic Ukrainian positions,” Mr. Zelenskyy said in his nightly video address. “The conversation was constructive, although not easy.”

He argued that established stars, having retired from other formats, deserve time to regain match fitness and their presence significantly boosts team morale and confidence, especially after tough losses.

title: 'It's time ...': Wedding cancelled! What Mandhana and Palash said in their statements
description: Indian cricketer Smriti Mandhana has confirmed the cancellation of her wedding to music composer Palash Muchhal, ending weeks of social media speculation. Both individuals have requested privacy for their families and expressed their desire to move forward. Muchhal also stated his team will take legal action against those spreading defamatory content.

description: In the video, Mr. Mamdani vowed to protect the city's 3 million immigrants, saying, “We can all stand up to ICE if you know your rights.”

description: The 20th session of the Intergovernmental Committee for the Safeguarding of Intangible Cultural Heritage will take place at the Red Fort from December 8 to 13.

title: Goa nightclub fire: NCR family vacay ends in grief; woman loses husband, 3 sisters
description: A family's Goan holiday turned tragic when a fire engulfed a nightclub, claiming four lives. Bhavana Joshi miraculously survived after her husband pushed her to safety before re-entering the inferno to save his sisters-in-law. The devastating incident left her the sole survivor, facing the grim task of informing their children of their parents' and aunts' untimely deaths.

title: A hundred years ago | Rains in the south
Did IndiGo 'waste time'? Govt probe to cover why airline delayed preps for new norms
description: A government panel is investigating IndiGo's alleged delay in preparing for new flight duty rules, potentially lobbying for exemptions instead. The probe will examine if this inaction, alongside other operational lapses, caused the recent flight crisis. The airline's failure to report preparedness and the DGCA's handling of the situation are also under scrutiny.

description: A senior official at the Civil Aviation Authority of Bangladesh (CAAB) said the aircraft has been allotted an 8 a.m. landing slot on Tuesday, with a departure time of 9 p.m. the same day, news portal bdnews24.com reported.

description: The document released by the White House said the U.S. wants to improve its relationship with Russia after years of Moscow being treated as a global pariah and that ending the war is a core U.S. interest to "reestablish strategic stability with Russia".

title: Only 1 exit, narrow lane: How Goa's '1st island club' built on salt pan became death zone; 25 killed
description: A tragic fire at Birch by Romeo Lane nightclub, built on a salt pan with inadequate safety measures, claimed 25 lives. The island club's design, featuring a poorly ventilated basement and limited access, severely hampered rescue efforts. Investigations are underway into the establishment's safety protocols and building design.

title: 2017 actor abduction case: Kerala court set to deliver verdict today; Dileep, Pulsar Suni among 10 accused
description: The Ernakulam principal sessions court is set to deliver its verdict on Monday in the sensational actor abduction and rape case, with actor Dileep accused of conspiracy. The trial, which began in 2018, involved 261 witnesses and extensive evidence, culminating in the court's decision on the fate of 10 accused, including prime accused Sunil N S alias Pulsar Suni.

title: Youth share tales of harassment at PDP meet on why Kashmiri professionals are turning to violence

title: December 8 : What happened on this day in history
description: December 8th marks significant historical moments, including the birth of Peshwa Balaji Bajirao and dance pioneer Uday Shankar. The day also commemorates the passing of revolutionary Bhai Parmanand. Globally, it recalls the tragic Vienna theatre fire of 1881 and the 1923 US-Germany Friendship Treaty, alongside a unique 2002 patent for cow urine.

Bill Gates' daughter gets $30M for AI app: Gates says won't invest; works helpdesk
description: Phoebe Gates' artificial intelligence shopping startup, Phia, has raised $30 million in new funding. This investment values the company at $180 million. Bill Gates, Phoebe's father, has supported the venture with his time and experience. Phia aims to make online shopping smarter and more sustainable. The app offers price comparisons, discounts, and secondhand options.

title: Grim theory on missing coach Travis Turner as veteran cop warns chilling clues
description: A missing Virginia football coach, Travis Turner, may never be found. He vanished from his home on November 20. Authorities charged him with child pornography offenses. A law enforcement expert states dense woods and wildlife make recovery difficult. Search teams are using advanced tools, but success remains uncertain. A reward is offered for information leading to his arrest.

title: Tim Pool reports shooting at his home as podcast controversy intensifies
description: Tim Pool reported shots fired at his West Virginia home on December 5, hours after a podcast episode featuring Milo Yiannopoulos made unverified claims about Erika and Charlie Kirk. Pool's security team is reviewing footage, and he suggested the incident was meant to intimidate. Authorities have not yet confirmed the shooting.

title: Anna Kournikova & Enrique Iglesias net worth 2025: Career, earnings, biz
description: Tennis star Anna Kournikova and music icon Enrique Iglesias boast a combined net worth of $160 million in 2025. While Kournikova's fame transcended her $4 million prize money through lucrative endorsements, Iglesias' wealth stems from over 130 million record sales and global tours. Both have strategically invested in Miami real estate, contributing to their substantial shared fortune.

title: LeBron James sends heartfelt 'family' message to fans after viral Toronto clip
description: LeBron James felt immense love from Toronto fans during the Lakers' recent game against the Raptors. The NBA legend, touched by the cheers and signs, called the fans "family" and expressed his deep appreciation for their unwavering support. He highlighted the special place Toronto holds in his heart, cherishing the warm welcome he always receives.

title: ‘Metaverse’ budget cut: Zuckerberg plans slash resources; company loses $70 billion
description: Meta is reportedly planning significant budget cuts for its Metaverse division, potentially slashing it by 30% as part of its 2026 annual planning. This move follows over $70 billion in losses for the Metaverse vision and a lack of consumer interest in its VR products. The company is now prioritizing its artificial intelligence efforts.

title: How did Cody Beef Franke die? Inside the tragic end of the Barstool Sports star
description: Cody "Beef" Franke, a beloved personality on Barstool Sports' Fore Play golf podcast, has tragically passed away at 31 following a sudden medical event. Known for his infectious humor and passion for golf, Franke was a former PGA professional who joined Barstool in 2025.
